summaries.brief_summary: Intense week with 77 PRs focused on OCaml 5.4.0 beta2 release, cross-platform support improvements, and major package ecosystem updates
summaries.new_features_summary: OCaml 5.4.0 beta2 release, extensive Windows/MinGW support packages, package maintenance intent documentation improvements
summaries.new_features:
- **OCaml 5.4.0 beta2 release** providing second beta of the upcoming compiler version ([c82e0af](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/c82e0af84361f95db5ec1b5698f9741e80d33c31))
- **Windows cross-platform support expansion** with new MinGW packages for graphics libraries including cairo, freetype, SDL2 components (image, mixer, net, ttf), and liblz4 compression ([#28515](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28515), [#28514](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28514), [#28513](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28513), [#28512](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28512), [#28510](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28510), [#28507](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28507), [#28505](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28505))
- **Enhanced package maintenance documentation** with new dune-project maintenance_intent field support in archiving policies ([720317d](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/720317d9bb427eee5a3ccb6f0966721ccb63eaf6))
- **Major build system update** with dune 3.20.2 release covering 15 packages including improved action plugins, configurator, and RPC support ([#28437](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28437))
- **New high-performance database driver** proton 1.0.14/1.0.15 for Timeplus Proton with ClickHouse native protocol, streaming queries, async inserts, and compression support ([#28497](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28497), [#28518](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28518))
- **Enhanced observability ecosystem** opentelemetry 0.12 release with 7 packages providing improved client backends for cohttp-eio, cohttp-lwt, ocurl, and logging integration ([#28469](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28469))
- **Mirage unikernel framework updates** with versions 4.10.0 and 4.10.1 addressing cmdliner and OCaml 5 compatibility ([#28464](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28464), [#28481](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28481))
summaries.activity_summary: Package ecosystem maintenance with lwt 6.0.0 compatibility preparation, Tezos package maintenance intent updates, and diverse new package submissions
summaries.activity:
- **Package ecosystem compatibility** preparation for lwt 6.0.0 alpha with [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) updating 65 packages to add dependency bounds preventing incompatibility ([#28482](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28482))
- **Diverse new package submissions** including [Michael Freeman](https://github.com/mfreeman451)'s proton database driver, [Mathieu Barbin](https://github.com/mbarbin)'s crs code review tool with OCaml 5.4.0 compatibility, [Corentin De Souza](https://github.com/fantazio)'s dead_code_analyzer static analysis tool, and [François Pottier](https://github.com/fpottier)'s menhir parser generator ecosystem update ([#28518](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28518), [#28522](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28522), [#28417](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28417), [#28508](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28508))
- **Tezos ecosystem maintenance** with [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) adding maintenance intent metadata to 200+ Octez and Tezos packages indicating "none" maintenance ([#28443](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28443))
- **Package version updates and fixes** including [Daniel Bünzli](https://github.com/dbuenzli)'s Unicode library suite (uucd, uucp, uunf, uuseg 17.0.0), [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm)'s albatross 2.6.0 and mirage updates, and [Mark Elvers](https://github.com/mtelvers)'s compatibility fixes ([#28502](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28502), [#28503](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28503), [#28495](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28495))
- **Testing and development tools** with [Martin Jambon](https://github.com/mjambon)'s testo 0.2.0 testing framework update, [Charles Averill](https://github.com/CharlesAverill)'s scope development tools, and [Kris De Volder](https://github.com/kdvolder)'s knights_tour algorithm package ([#28504](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28504), [#28457](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28457), [#28458](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28458))
summaries.discussions_summary: Package availability and OCaml 5.4.0 ecosystem readiness discussions with Windows compatibility troubleshooting
summaries.notable_discussions:
- **Windows installation troubleshooting** in [#28509](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28509) with [Jonas Oberhauser](https://github.com/JonasOberhauser) reporting ocamlc crashes during Coq installation, traced to ocamlfind 1.9.6 path normalization bugs and resolved through version pinning
- **OCaml 5.4.0 release preparation** coordination in [#27916](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27916) by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) tracking ecosystem readiness and addressing ppxlib dependency conflicts between < 0.36 and >= 0.36 versions
- **Package archival policy discussions** in [#28489](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28489) by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) about scheduling archival runs and updating minimum OCaml version from 4.08 to 4.14
- **Infrastructure reliability** concern in [#28479](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28479) with [@Rayn658](https://github.com/Rayn658) reporting findlib download server returning 504 errors affecting package availability
summaries.trends_summary: Cross-platform maturation with Windows support focus, proactive compatibility management for major version transitions, and automated package maintenance
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Cross-platform ecosystem maturation** with [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) leading comprehensive Windows support through MinGW and Cygwin compatibility packages for graphics, SDL2, and compression libraries ([#28515](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28515), [#28514](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28514), [#28513](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28513), [#28512](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28512), [#28510](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28510), [#28507](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28507), [#28505](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28505))
- **Proactive compatibility management** for major version transitions including lwt 6.0.0 alpha preparation and OCaml 5.4.0 beta testing with ecosystem-wide dependency constraint updates ([#28482](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28482), [#28483](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28483))
- **Package maintenance formalization** with enhanced metadata including x-maintenance-intent fields and dune-project maintenance_intent integration improving archival policy documentation ([#28443](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28443), [720317d](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/720317d9bb427eee5a3ccb6f0966721ccb63eaf6))
- **Automated package publishing workflow** with extensive use of opam-publish automation for new releases and version updates across diverse domains from databases to gaming algorithms ([#28518](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28518), [#28522](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28522), [#28508](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28508))
- **Infrastructure modernization** addressing opam 2.2+ behavior changes and build process improvements while maintaining backward compatibility ([#28495](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28495))
summaries.contributors_summary: 32 contributors led by cross-platform specialist Jan Midtgaard, database driver developer Michael Freeman, and core tooling maintainers
summaries.contributors:
- [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) implemented comprehensive **Windows cross-platform support** with 6 PRs adding MinGW and Cygwin packages for graphics libraries (freetype, cairo), SDL2 components (image, mixer, net, ttf), and compression (liblz4) ([#28515](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28515), [#28514](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28514), [#28513](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28513), [#28512](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28512), [#28510](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28510), [#28507](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28507), [#28505](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28505))
- [Michael Freeman](https://github.com/mfreeman451) contributed **high-performance database tooling** with 13 PRs primarily focused on proton package versions providing ClickHouse native protocol support for Timeplus ([#28518](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28518), [#28497](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28497))
- [François Pottier](https://github.com/fpottier) released **Menhir parser generator ecosystem** update with 4 packages (menhir, menhirCST, menhirLib, menhirSdk 20250912) ([#28508](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28508))
- [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) managed **large-scale ecosystem compatibility** with lwt 6.0.0 preparation affecting 65 packages and Tezos maintenance intent updates for 200+ packages ([#28482](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28482), [#28443](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28443))
- [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) coordinated **OCaml 5.4.0 beta2 release** and ecosystem readiness tracking ([#28483](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28483), [#27916](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27916))
- [@mtelvers](https://github.com/mtelvers) contributed **package maintenance and compatibility fixes** including efl bounds, tezos-rust-libs checksum updates, and build system improvements ([#28495](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28495), [#28491](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28491), [#28494](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28494))
- [@maiste](https://github.com/maiste) released **dune 3.20.2** build system update covering 15 packages with enhanced features and compatibility ([#28437](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28437))
- [@dbuenzli](https://github.com/dbuenzli) updated **Unicode library suite** (uucd, uucp, uunf, uuseg) to version 17.0.0 ([#28502](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28502))
- [@hannesm](https://github.com/hannesm) maintained **unikernel ecosystem** with albatross 2.6.0 and mirage framework updates, and initiated archival policy discussions ([#28503](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28503), [#28464](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28464), [#28481](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28481), [#28489](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28489))
- [@jesse-greathouse](https://github.com/jesse-greathouse) contributed **opentelemetry observability ecosystem** with 7 packages in version 0.12 release ([#28469](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28469))

summaries.brief_summary: Major package ecosystem additions including Dune 3.20.2, new OCaml tools, and enhanced static analysis capabilities
summaries.new_features_summary: New packages for image viewing, PPX tools, static analysis, and protocol handling with bug fixes for OCaml 5.3 compatibility
summaries.new_features:
- **New image viewer** scope 1.0 and 1.1 by [Charles Averill](https://github.com/CharlesAverill) providing OCaml-based image file viewing ([#28434](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28434), [#28457](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28457))
- **PPX format strings enhancement** ppx_format 1.0 by [Emile Trotignon](https://github.com/EmileTrotignon) enabling values next to format specifiers in format strings ([#28450](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28450))
- **Enhanced static analysis** with Goblint 2.6.0 by [Simmo Saan](https://github.com/sim642) adding division by zero analysis, bitfield domain, and YAML ghost witness generation ([#28447](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28447))
- **Build system improvements** with Dune 3.20.2 by [Etienne](https://github.com/maiste) fixing JavaScript compilation and Cygwin bootstrap issues ([#28437](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28437))
- **Knights Tour solver** version 0.0.6 by [Kris De Volder](https://github.com/kdvolder) with new collections library, stochastic estimator, and React-based monitoring UI ([#28458](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28458))
- **File dialog bindings** tinyfiledialogs 1.0 by [Charles Averill](https://github.com/CharlesAverill) providing OCaml bindings to cross-platform file dialogs ([#28456](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28456))
- **Protocol conversion tools** ppx_protocol_conv 5.2.3 by [Anders Peter Fugmann](https://github.com/andersfugmann) with ppxlib 0.36.0 compatibility ([#28411](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28411))
- **DHCP protocol enhancements** charrua 2.1.0 by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) adding client FQDN support and runtime DHCP configuration ([#28432](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28432))
- **Memory management tools** memprof-limits 0.3.0 by [Guillaume Munch-Maccagnoni](https://github.com/gadmm) providing per-thread memory limits and allocation tracking ([#28442](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28442))
- **Chess API libraries** updated versions 1.0.1 of chess_com_api, lichess_api, and pgn_parser by [Boris Novoselov](https://github.com/Ckaf) ([#28416](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28416))
summaries.activity_summary: Package maintenance focused on OCaml 5.3 compatibility fixes, dependency constraint updates, and Windows/cross-platform support improvements
summaries.activity:
- **Compatibility maintenance** by [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) fixing OCaml compiler version bounds for boltzgen packages due to Pprintast API changes in 5.3 ([#28446](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28446))
- **Dependency constraint fixes** including yojson version bounds for linol package ([#28445](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28445)) and various build system improvements
- **Platform support enhancements** with Arch Linux support for conf-gmp by [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) ([#28428](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28428)) and Windows configuration packages
- **Parser generator updates** with Menhir 20250903 by [François Pottier](https://github.com/fpottier) ([#28436](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28436))
- **Streaming software release** Liquidsoap 2.4.0 by [Romain Beauxis](https://github.com/toots) ([#28429](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28429))
- **Development tool releases** including F* compiler 2025.09.04 by [Guido Martínez](https://github.com/mtzguido) ([#28451](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28451))
- **Static site generator** YOCaml 2.4.1 by [Xavier Van de Woestyne](https://github.com/xvw) with improved TOC handling and markdown processing ([#28430](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28430))
- **Logic programming** ELPI 3.2.0 and 3.3.1 by [Enrico Tassi](https://github.com/gares) with language refinements and test improvements ([#28426](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28426), [#28435](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28435))
- **Version control tools** Volgo 0.0.21 by [Mathieu Barbin](https://github.com/mbarbin) with improved diff handling and branch name support ([#28410](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28410))
- **Archive policy implementation** with Tezos packages marked with no maintenance intent by [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) ([#28443](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28443))
summaries.discussions_summary: Technical discussions focused on build system failures, CI infrastructure improvements, and package compatibility issues
summaries.notable_discussions:
- **OCaml 5.3.0 installation issues** on Arch Linux discussed in [#28438](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28438) with build script compatibility problems and install-sh version conflicts
- **Windows cross-compilation support** discussion around system-cygwin package request in [#28415](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28415) for better Cygwin integration with opam
- **MinGW package conflicts** on MSYS2 platform affecting opam-core installation discussed in [#28431](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28431)
summaries.trends_summary: Growing focus on OCaml 5.3 compatibility, cross-platform support improvements, and package maintenance automation
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **OCaml 5.3 migration** with multiple packages requiring compatibility fixes due to compiler-libs API changes and new language features
- **Cross-platform development** emphasis with Windows MinGW support improvements and Cygwin integration discussions
- **Package maintenance automation** through x-maintenance-intent field adoption helping with repository archival policies
- **Static analysis tooling expansion** with enhanced capabilities in Goblint and new protocol analysis tools
- **UI/UX tool development** trend including new image viewers, file dialogs, and interactive monitoring interfaces

- [@maiste](https://github.com/maiste) managed Dune build system release 3.20.2 with JavaScript and Cygwin fixes ([#28437](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28437))
- [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) implemented package archival policies for Tezos packages ([#28443](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28443))

- [@mbarbin](https://github.com/mbarbin) released version control tools in Volgo package suite ([#28410](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28410))

summaries.brief_summary: Active week with 30 merged PRs introducing chess ecosystem packages, major updates to Dune 3.20.1 and crypto libraries, plus Windows platform support improvements
summaries.new_features_summary: New chess ecosystem packages (PGN parser, Lichess/Chess.com APIs), Dune 3.20.1 updates, mirage-crypto 2.0.2 security improvements, Windows platform support expansion
summaries.new_features:
- **Chess ecosystem packages** introduced by [Boris Novoselov](https://github.com/Ckaf) with comprehensive chess tooling including PGN parsing, board visualization, Zobrist hashing, and API clients for Lichess and Chess.com platforms ([#28404](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28404))
- **Dune 3.20.1 release** by [Etienne](https://github.com/maiste) with 15 packages updated, fixing runtest-js dependencies and path interpretation issues ([#28397](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28397))
- **Mirage-crypto 2.0.2 security update** by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) across 6 packages, addressing ECDSA public key compression vulnerabilities ([#28382](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28382))
- **Windows platform support expansion** by [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) with GTK2/GTK3 support for MinGW, MSys2, and Cygwin environments ([#28387](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28387), [#28389](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28389), [#28376](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28376))
- **LWT 5.9.2 improvements** by [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) for promises and event-driven I/O functionality ([#28384](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28384))
- **SMT solver ecosystem updates** with smtml 0.10.0 frontend improvements ([#28399](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28399)) and smtml 0.1.2 revival for owi compatibility ([#28409](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28409))
- **Protocol-9p 2.1.0 updates** with cmdliner 1.1.0 compatibility and sexplib bounds removal across 3 packages ([#28394](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28394))
- **NetBSD support addition** for conf-libev 4-13 with pkgsrc integration ([#28408](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28408))
summaries.activity_summary: Package maintenance dominated with dependency bound fixes, PPX ecosystem compatibility updates, URL corrections for broken packages, and fswatch deprecation due to packaging issues
summaries.activity:
- **Package dependency management** improvements across multiple libraries with [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) leading fixes for PPX rapper bounds ([#28371](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28371)), pg_query architecture constraints ([#28372](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28372)), and owi SMT solver compatibility ([#28400](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28400))
- **PPX ecosystem stability** maintained by [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) with ppxlib compatibility fixes addressing recent version changes ([#28388](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28388))
- **Package infrastructure maintenance** including broken URL fixes for shuttle_http and shuttle_websocket packages ([#28407](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28407)), and contact information updates for ocaml-sfml ([#28356](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28356))
- **Library deprecation handling** with fswatch and conf-fswatch packages flagged as deprecated due to unresolved Debian/Ubuntu packaging issues affecting development usage ([#28396](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28396))
- **Major version releases** including GitHub API 4.5.0 with 4 packages ([#28390](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28390)), FFmpeg bindings 1.2.6 with 8 packages ([#28401](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28401)), and Ortac 0.7.2 bugfix release ([#28403](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28403))
- **Coq ecosystem updates** with coq-waterproof packages for both Coq 8.17 and 9.0 versions ([#28402](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28402), [#28405](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28405))
summaries.trends_summary: Strong focus on cross-platform compatibility, proactive dependency management, and ecosystem maintenance with emphasis on Windows development support
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Cross-platform development focus** with substantial Windows support improvements across GUI and audio libraries, enabling better Windows development experiences for OCaml projects
- **Proactive dependency management** pattern showing maintainers actively addressing version bounds and compatibility issues before they become blocking problems for users
- **SMT solver ecosystem stabilization** with coordinated updates between smtml, owi, and related verification tools to maintain compatibility during interface changes
- **Chess and gaming library development** emergence with comprehensive tooling for chess applications, suggesting growing interest in OCaml for game development
- **Security-first updates** particularly visible in mirage-crypto releases prioritizing cryptographic vulnerability fixes
- **Ecosystem health maintenance** through systematic deprecation of problematic packages and proactive URL/contact information updates
summaries.contributors_summary: 24 unique contributors led by Jan Midtgaard with cross-platform support work and Hannes Mehnert with crypto/networking updates, plus active package maintenance across the community
summaries.contributors:
- [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) contributed 7 merged PRs focusing on **Windows platform support expansion** with GTK2/GTK3 integration ([#28387](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28387), [#28389](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28389), [#28376](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28376)), **dependency bound fixes** for PPX and SMT tools ([#28371](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28371), [#28372](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28372), [#28400](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28400)), and **package maintenance** work ([#28407](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28407))
- [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) delivered 6 PRs with **mirage-crypto security updates** ([#28382](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28382)), **networking library releases** including protocol-9p 2.1.0 and hvsock 3.1.0 ([#28394](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28394), [#28393](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28393)), **SMT toolchain maintenance** ([#28409](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28409)), and **NetBSD platform support** ([#28408](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28408))
- [Etienne](https://github.com/maiste) released **Dune 3.20.1** with 15 package updates addressing build system improvements ([#28397](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28397))
- [Boris Novoselov](https://github.com/Ckaf) introduced the **chess ecosystem** with PGN parser and API clients for major chess platforms ([#28404](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28404))
- [Raphaël Proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) contributed **LWT 5.9.2 improvements** ([#28384](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28384)) and **PPX compatibility fixes** ([#28388](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28388))
- [Kate](https://github.com/kit-ty-kate) released **GitHub API 4.5.0** with 4 package updates ([#28390](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28390))
- [Jean-Christophe Filliatre](https://github.com/backtracking) contributed **bitv 2.1** bit vector library update ([#28391](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28391))
- [@aliheidary1381](https://github.com/aliheidary1381) added **prolect 1.1.3** package with manual submission due to opam-publish issues ([#28395](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28395))
- Additional contributors included [@toots](https://github.com/toots) with **FFmpeg 1.2.6 bindings** ([#28401](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28401)), [@n-osborne](https://github.com/n-osborne) with **Ortac 0.7.2** ([#28403](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28403)), [@geonot](https://github.com/geonot) with **OpenCage 1.0.5** ([#28381](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28381)), and [@tmcgilchrist](https://github.com/tmcgilchrist) with **opam-compiler 0.2.1** supporting GitHub URL sources ([#28374](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28374))

summaries.brief_summary: Major ecosystem releases including Dune 3.20.0, TLS/mirage-crypto 2.0.2, and enhanced Windows support

summaries.activity_summary: Package maintenance with PPX compatibility fixes, dependency bounds corrections, and ecosystem updates
summaries.activity:
- **PPX compatibility crisis resolution** with strategic bounds fixes for ppx_rapper family affecting test failures with newer ppxlib versions by [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) ([#28370](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28370), [#28373](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28373))
- **Cross-platform compatibility improvements** led by [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) addressing Windows development experience with systematic GUI and audio library support ([#28382](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28382), [#28381](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28381), [#28378](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28378))
- **Package dependency maintenance** including opam-compiler missing 're' dependency fixes and refl OCaml 5.3 compatibility updates ([#28375](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28375), [#28364](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28364))
- **New package releases** including bitv 2.1 data structure library by [Jean-Christophe Filliatre](https://github.com/backtracking), opencage geocoding API 1.0.5, and tacit functional programming 1.0.0 ([#28372](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28372), [#28374](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28374), [#28355](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28355))
- **Infrastructure and tooling updates** including Docker and presentation tools with dockerfile 8.3.0 and slipshow 0.6.0 releases ([#28358](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28358), [#28351](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28351))
- **Contact information updates** for SDL and SFML bindings maintaining accurate maintainer information across multimedia libraries ([#28320](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28320))
summaries.trends_summary: Focus on Windows ecosystem expansion, coordinated security releases, and cross-platform compatibility
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Coordinated security releases** becoming standard practice with simultaneous updates across related packages like TLS and mirage-crypto demonstrating ecosystem maturity
- **Windows platform prioritization** with systematic addition of MinGW, MSys2, and Cygwin support across GUI and audio libraries expanding OCaml's cross-platform reach
- **Deep learning ecosystem growth** with coordinated neural networks and CUDA computing libraries indicating expanding use in scientific computing
- **Repository automation advancement** with Dependabot integration and improved CI workflows reducing maintenance overhead for maintainers
- **PPX ecosystem stabilization** efforts addressing compatibility issues with strategic bounds management preventing test failures across dependent packages

- [Daniel Bünzli](https://github.com/dbuenzli) released logs 0.9.0 with enhanced logging capabilities and coordinated the logs-async compatibility updates
- [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) released QCheck 0.26 suite and systematically added compatibility bounds across containers, goblint, and prbnmcn-stats packages to prevent breakage
- [@hhugo](https://github.com/hhugo) released comprehensive js_of_ocaml 6.1.1 suite including compiler, PPX, lwt, tyxml, and toplevel packages
- [Enrico Tassi](https://github.com/gares) released elpi 3.0.0 logic programming system with enhanced functionality
- [Yishuai Li](https://github.com/liyishuai) contributed multiple platform and compatibility fixes including OCaml 5 constraints for camlimages and freetds macOS availability
- [Michael Dales](https://github.com/mdales) added giflib 1.0.2 graphics library with OCaml version constraints
- [Simmo Saan](https://github.com/sim642) added goblint catapult upper bound constraint for compatibility
- [@orbitz](https://github.com/orbitz) continued work on PDS package updates with ongoing test resolution efforts in [#27694](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/27694)

summaries.brief_summary: Extensive package ecosystem updates including OPAM 2.4.0-rc1, JS_of_OCaml 6.1.0, and compatibility fixes for OCaml 5.3
summaries.new_features_summary: New package releases include smtml 0.8.0 SMT solver frontend and 8 OPAM 2.4.0-rc1 packages with improved functionality
summaries.new_features:
- **SMT solver frontend** package smtml 0.8.0 providing consistent interface across multiple solvers with formula optimization and caching [#28137](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28137)
- **OPAM 2.4.0 release candidate** with 8 packages including enhanced package management features and improved solver functionality ([opam-client.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-core.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-devel.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-format.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-installer.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-repository.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-solver.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161), [opam-state.2.4.0~rc1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/9470aba93632297106b9612a8fcf831b53839161))
- **JS_of_OCaml 6.1.0** release with 8 packages including improved compiler, PPX extensions, and WebAssembly support ([js_of_ocaml.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [js_of_ocaml-compiler.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [js_of_ocaml-lwt.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [js_of_ocaml-ppx.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [js_of_ocaml-ppx_deriving_json.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [js_of_ocaml-toplevel.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [js_of_ocaml-tyxml.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c), [wasm_of_ocaml-compiler.6.1.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/f616ebd2f6dafc478763de112fc071a4991bc74c))
- **Raven ecosystem** debut with 9 packages for data science and numerical computing including raven.1.0.0~alpha0, nx.1.0.0~alpha0, hugin.1.0.0~alpha0, kaun.1.0.0~alpha0, quill.1.0.0~alpha0, rune.1.0.0~alpha0, sowilo.1.0.0~alpha0, nx-datasets.1.0.0~alpha0, and nx-text.1.0.0~alpha0 ([#28111](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28111))
- **Ortac 0.7.0** testing framework release with 6 packages for property-based testing and specification verification (ortac-core.0.7.0, ortac-dune.0.7.0, ortac-qcheck-stm.0.7.0, ortac-runtime-qcheck-stm.0.7.0, ortac-runtime.0.7.0, ortac-wrapper.0.7.0) ([#28133](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28133))
- **Security library updates** including ca-certs-nss 3.113.1 for updated certificate authorities ([ca-certs-nss.3.113.1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/cbdb367dc09a2e821ebfc0f7c947abe3be40c2e3))
- **Binary analysis tooling** with binsec 0.10.1 for program analysis and verification ([binsec.0.10.1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/2f8da8006e57f7d4bbb6f3f7cdbb6493cc1f8d2d))
- **Regular expression engine** re 1.13.2 with performance improvements and bug fixes ([re.1.13.2](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/7e9bd608034c6fa838cb540561e539f55b569f1c))
- **Template engine** jingoo 1.5.1 with enhanced functionality ([jingoo.1.5.1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/cb5a3f18cd4420bf25d6e887a8cfcfee2ce5325d))
- **Presentation tool** slipshow 0.3.0 for creating slide presentations ([slipshow.0.3.0](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/306cc6ffb80578e6b1f7bf226755fd05951634e5))

summaries.discussions_summary: Active policy discussion on package retention with focus on dune version availability for reproducible builds and platform maintenance
summaries.notable_discussions:
- **Package retention policy** debate regarding automatic removal of old package versions, specifically dune versions needed for reproducible builds in [Ralf Jung](https://github.com/RalfJung)'s request to keep older dune versions available ([#28065](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28065))
- **Build reproducibility** concerns from platform maintainers needing stable package definitions for CI systems and long-term project maintenance, with suggestions for pinning strategies and legacy repository usage ([#28065](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28065))
- **Coq Platform integration** challenges discussed with maintainers working on solutions to use legacy opam repository for older releases while maintaining performance ([#28065](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28065))
summaries.trends_summary: Strong ecosystem expansion in data science tooling and continued focus on OCaml 5.3 compatibility across the package ecosystem
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Data science ecosystem growth** with comprehensive Raven framework introduction covering machine learning, data manipulation, and visualization through 9 related packages
- **OCaml 5.3 preparation** showing widespread compatibility testing and constraint updates across foundational packages like dune, gen_js_api, and cohttp-async
- **Release candidate testing** with OPAM 2.4.0-rc1 indicating upcoming package manager improvements and enhanced functionality
- **WebAssembly support expansion** through updated JS_of_OCaml packages including dedicated wasm_of_ocaml-compiler
- **Testing framework evolution** with Ortac 0.7.0 providing enhanced property-based testing and specification verification capabilities
summaries.contributors_summary: Active contributions from [@filipeom](https://github.com/filipeom) with package publishing and [Shon Feder](https://github.com/shonfeder) with maintenance reviews
summaries.contributors:
- [@filipeom](https://github.com/filipeom) published smtml 0.8.0 SMT solver frontend package with comprehensive solver integration ([#28137](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28137))
- [Shon Feder](https://github.com/shonfeder) provided package publication review and approval for smtml package ([#28137](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/pull/28137))
- [Ralf Jung](https://github.com/RalfJung) initiated important policy discussion on package retention affecting build reproducibility and platform maintenance ([#28065](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28065))
- Multiple contributors involved in extensive package releases including OPAM 2.4.0-rc1, JS_of_OCaml 6.1.0, Raven ecosystem, and Ortac testing framework updates through automated publishing systems and manual reviews

summaries.brief_summary: Major package ecosystem updates with 119 files changed, featuring new Irmin 3.11.0 release and plplot GCC 14 fixes.
summaries.new_features_summary: New package releases include Irmin 3.11.0 (distributed storage), Merlin language server updates, and Frama-C 31.0 static analyzer.
summaries.new_features:
- **Irmin distributed storage** major release 3.11.0 with 17 packages including irmin-pack, irmin-git, irmin-cli, and irmin-graphql for scalable OCaml data storage solutions
- **Merlin language server** updates with new 4.19-414 and 5.5-503 releases providing better IDE support for OCaml development
- **LSP protocol implementation** 1.23.0 release improving editor integration capabilities for OCaml projects
- **Frama-C static analyzer** 31.0-Gallium release for C program verification and analysis
- **CVC5 SMT solver** 1.3.0 integration enabling advanced constraint solving capabilities
- **Dream HTML templating** 3.11.0 release with pure-html companion package for web development
- **Statocaml static site generator** complete suite with 11 packages including GUI, GitHub integration, and plotting capabilities
- **Fixed GCC 14 compatibility** in plplot package addressing incompatible-pointer-types errors with new compiler flags ([#28095](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28095))
- **Legacy package restoration** for older Elpi versions (1.16.10, 1.17.4, 1.18.1, 1.19.6) to support Coq-Elpi compatibility
- **OCaml 5.4 compatibility** updates for ppx_deriving, num, and ppxlib_jane packages
summaries.activity_summary: Package maintenance focused on GCC 14 compatibility fixes and OCaml 5.4 support across multiple packages.
summaries.activity:
- **Compiler compatibility** improvements with [Marcello Seri](https://github.com/mseri) addressing GCC 14 build failures in plplot and implementing `-Wno-error=incompatible-pointer-types` flags ([#28095](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28095), [#28107](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28107))
- **OCaml 5.4 support** enhancements with version constraint updates for ppx_deriving, num package, and ppxlib_jane compatibility
- **Legacy package restoration** by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) reviving older Elpi versions needed for coq-elpi compatibility
- **Repository maintenance** tasks including marking gmp-xen and minios-xen as unmaintained packages and TexLive configuration fixes for macOS
- **Dependency constraint** refinements for jsonrpc yojson compatibility and smtml-cvc5 version alignment
summaries.discussions_summary: Policy discussion on old package removal affecting CI reproducibility and platform releases.
summaries.notable_discussions:
- **Package retention policy** debate initiated by [Ralf Jung](https://github.com/RalfJung) regarding automatic removal of old Dune versions causing CI rebuild overhead and reproducibility issues ([#28065](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28065))
- **Coq Platform compatibility** concerns raised by contributors about maintaining specific Dune versions for stable platform releases, with discussions on using opam-repository-archive for better reproducibility
- **Merlin availability** issue for OCaml 4.14 resolved through package ordering clarification ([#28075](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28075))
summaries.contributors_summary: Major contributions from Marcello Seri on GCC compatibility and Hannes Mehnert on legacy package maintenance.
summaries.contributors:
- [Marcello Seri](https://github.com/mseri) resolved GCC 14 compatibility issues in plplot ([#28095](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28095)), prepared multiple package releases including plplot 5.12.1 ([#28107](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28107)), and fixed dependency constraints for jsonrpc and smtml packages
- [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) revived legacy Elpi packages for Coq compatibility, participated in package retention policy discussions ([#28065](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28065)), and performed repository maintenance tasks
- [@smuenzel](https://github.com/smuenzel) contributed OCaml 5.4 compatibility fixes for multiple packages including ppx_deriving, num, and z3, and addressed Python distutils removal issues
- [@clecat](https://github.com/clecat) released comprehensive Irmin 3.11.0 update with 17 packages for distributed storage functionality
- [@voodoos](https://github.com/voodoos) released new Merlin versions 4.19-414 and 5.5-503 improving OCaml language server capabilities
- [@yawaramin](https://github.com/yawaramin) contributed Dream HTML templating updates with version 3.11.0 release
- [@zoggy](https://github.com/zoggy) released complete Statocaml static site generator suite with 11 integrated packages
- [@conroj](https://github.com/conroj) identified and documented GCC 14 compatibility issues in plplot package
- [Ralf Jung](https://github.com/RalfJung) initiated important policy discussions about package retention affecting CI reproducibility
- [@hernoufM](https://github.com/hernoufM) reported Merlin availability issues for OCaml 4.14 ([#28075](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28075))

summaries.trends_summary: Focus on package ecosystem maintenance and compatibility updates rather than new functionality
summaries.emerging_trends:

- **Dependency management focus** with multiple commits addressing version constraints and compatibility issues across the package ecosystem

summaries.brief_summary: Major package releases including Dune 3.19.1, Sail 0.19.1, and Jane Street Base v0.17.3, plus Windows compatibility improvements
summaries.new_features_summary: New packages added: CamlIDL 1.13, CUDD 0.1.1, OCaml-Unikraft 1.0.0, plus Windows compatibility fixes for conf packages
summaries.new_features:
- **New CamlIDL version 1.13** supporting OCaml interface generation from C ([#28025](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28025))
- **CUDD binary decision diagram library 0.1.1** with Z3 4.15.1 support and improved macOS compatibility ([#28009](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28009))
- **OCaml-Unikraft 1.0.0** complete package suite for unikernel development, including ARM64 and x86_64 backends ([#27856](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27856))
- **Windows compatibility improvements** for multiple conf packages: fixed Cygwin depext checks for conf-cairo, conf-clang Windows support, and marked libev as Windows-unavailable ([093bb8c](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/093bb8c87e3486d82f5376482f2c1034bf7a6f93), [4f70d22](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/4f70d221ded5eae82812b4a03eb43a6c2234951f))
- **Fast bitvector library 0.1.0.1** with performance optimizations for bit manipulation operations ([#28002](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28002))
- **Version control system packages** including volgo suite 0.0.18 with Git and Mercurial backend support ([#28013](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28013))
summaries.activity_summary: Dune 3.19.1 and Sail 0.19.1 major releases, Jane Street packages v0.17.x updates, CI fixes, and package maintenance
summaries.activity:
- **Dune 3.19.1 release** with 15 packages including build system improvements, configurator updates, and RPC enhancements ([#28017](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28017))
- **Sail formal specification language 0.19.1** complete release with 12 backend packages for C, Coq, LaTeX, Lean, Lem, and SystemVerilog targets ([#28004](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28004))
- **Jane Street Base ecosystem v0.17.3** update including base, ppx_expect, and related packages with dependency constraint fixes ([#28012](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28012))
- **PPX package updates** including 15 Jane Street packages (ppx_bench, ppx_bin_prot, ppx_diff, etc.) with ppxlib compatibility improvements ([#27958](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27958))
- **Package dependency fixes** including upper bounds added for kappa-library 4.1.3 on yojson, and ppxlib version constraints ([#28020](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28020), [#28019](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28019))
- **Windows CI infrastructure** restored after cache invalidation resolved MinGW build failures ([#28007](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28007))
- **Package deprecations** for duppy and dtools packages, removing them from liquidsoap dependencies ([5df1368](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/5df13688494523d021c6e099ce611d8a0df0c2c4))
- **Bug fixes** including ocaml-lsp-server 1.22.1~5.4preview dependency corrections and dream-inertia undefined variable issue resolution ([#28010](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28010), [#27955](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27955))
summaries.trends_summary: Continued focus on Windows compatibility, CI infrastructure stability, and ecosystem package updates
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Windows platform support** improvements with systematic fixes to conf packages for better Cygwin integration and Windows-specific availability constraints
- **Infrastructure resilience** focus with CI cache management and build system reliability improvements
- **Ecosystem synchronization** with coordinated releases of related package families (Jane Street, Sail, Dune)
- **Dependency management** emphasis on adding upper bounds and compatibility constraints to prevent breaking changes
summaries.contributors_summary: Multiple maintainers contributed including Shon Feder, Kate, Jan Midtgaard, and package authors across ecosystem updates
summaries.contributors:
- [Shon Feder](https://github.com/shonfeder) created issues for adding upper bounds on ocaml-compiler-libs ([#28023](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28023)) and proposed moving documentation from Wiki to main repository ([#28022](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28022))
- [Jan Midtgaard](https://github.com/jmid) reported and debugged Windows MinGW CI failures, providing detailed analysis of runner image changes ([#28007](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28007))
- [Kate](https://github.com/kit-ty-kate) fixed dream-inertia undefined variable issue and contributed to dependency fixes ([#27955](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27955), [#28010](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28010))
- [@raphael-proust](https://github.com/raphael-proust) contributed MariaDB configuration fixes that were eventually merged ([#27865](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27865))
- [@xavierleroy](https://github.com/xavierleroy) contributed CamlIDL 1.13 package update ([#28025](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28025))
- [@dkalinichenko-js](https://github.com/dkalinichenko-js) contributed Base ecosystem v0.17.3 and multiple PPX package updates ([#28012](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28012), [#27958](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27958))
- [@mbarbin](https://github.com/mbarbin) added Windows Cygwin support for conf-hg and contributed volgo VCS package suite ([#28021](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28021), [#28013](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28013))
- [@maiste](https://github.com/maiste) contributed Dune 3.19.1 release with 15 packages ([#28017](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28017))
- [@mseri](https://github.com/mseri) provided package maintenance including kappa-library fixes and ppxlib bounds ([#28020](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28020), [#28019](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/28019))

summaries.brief_summary: New package releases including Yojson 3.0.0, Spurs sparse matrix library, and Coq-LSP updates with maintenance fixes

summaries.trends_summary: Strong focus on package maintenance, cross-platform compatibility, and multi-version Coq ecosystem support
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Multi-version package support** trend continuing with Coq-LSP releasing simultaneously for five different Coq versions
- **Cross-platform compatibility** improvements with Windows and OpenBSD support additions
- **Archive reliability** focus through mirror URL additions and source archive updates
- **OCaml 5.x ecosystem** maturation with packages supporting newer compiler versions and sparse matrix libraries
- **SMT solver ecosystem** expansion with Bitwuzla C++ API bindings joining the formal verification toolchain

summaries.brief_summary: Major ecosystem releases including cohttp 6.1.1, OCaml 5.4 preview tooling, and numerous package updates with bug fixes
summaries.new_features_summary: New packages awa 0.5.2, cohttp 6.1.1, containers 3.16, LLVM 19, OCaml 5.4 preview tools, and WebAssembly 2.0.2
summaries.new_features:
- **New SSH implementation** awa 0.5.2 with MirageOS support and improved dependency management ([37954a4f50fea](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/37954a4f50fea), [176b8825dea](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/176b8825dea))
- **HTTP client library** cohttp 6.1.1 release with 14 packages including async, lwt, and mirage backends ([5731c8d16f43](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/5731c8d16f43))
- **Container utilities** containers 3.16 with expanded data structures and utilities ([3a5ba58fc561](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/3a5ba58fc561))
- **LLVM compiler bindings** version 19 with shared and static variants ([4ebdae5e48b69](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/4ebdae5e48b69))
- **OCaml 5.4 preview tooling** including dot-merlin-reader 5.4.2, merlin 5.4.2, and ocaml-lsp-server 1.22.1 for early OCaml 5.4 testing ([0513bad99e6bd](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/0513bad99e6bd), [6aba779d97dbe](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/6aba779d97dbe))
- **WebAssembly support** wasm 2.0.2 with improved build and installation ([e7e8b492fc7](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/e7e8b492fc7))
- **Static site generator** YoCaml 2.3.0 with 12 new packages for various backends and formats ([bd0bcfe82a88c](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/bd0bcfe82a88c))
- **System configuration packages** for LLVM 19, QEMU image tools, POV-Ray, and MinGW-W64 Gnome Canvas support ([11859fd62a66](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/11859fd62a66))
- **Binary format library** bin_prot v0.17.0-1 patch fixing build issues on OpenSUSE and FreeBSD ([6052cd24dd6](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/6052cd24dd6))
- **Development tools** fast_bitvector 0.0.5, ancient 0.10.0, and ppx_unreachable 1.0 for various programming utilities ([8ebd81361d0219](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/8ebd81361d0219), [19df5e47af083](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/commit/19df5e47af083))
summaries.activity_summary: OCaml 5.4 release preparation, bin_prot compilation fixes, and ecosystem compatibility updates
summaries.activity:
- **OCaml 5.4 release readiness** tracked by [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) with platform tools and ecosystem porting status, ppxlib ecosystem split discussion ([#27916](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27916))
- **Build system fixes** for bin_prot v0.17.0 addressing OpenSUSE and FreeBSD compilation failures with patch-based solution by [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) ([#26005](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/26005), [#27646](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27646))
- **Package compatibility updates** including cca conflicts with mirage-mtime 5.0.0, lsp csexp dependency fixes, and ppx_minidebug restrictions with ppx_sexp_conv ([#27952](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27952))
- **Docker tooling** updates with dockerfile-cmd packages 8.2.7 and 8.2.8 for OCaml containerization workflows
- **MirageOS ecosystem** maintenance with x-maintenance-intent stanzas and mirage-channel 5.0.0 release
- **FFmpeg bindings** liquidsoap 2.3.3 and ffmpeg 1.2.5 multimedia processing updates
summaries.trends_summary: OCaml 5.4 ecosystem preparation and ppxlib compatibility management across the package repository
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **OCaml 5.4 ecosystem preparation** with preview tooling releases and core platform compatibility tracking across opam-alpha-repository ([#27916](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27916))
- **ppxlib ecosystem migration** from versions < 0.36 to >= 0.36 affecting approximately 373 packages awaiting conversion ([#27916](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27916))
- **Cross-platform build improvements** with targeted fixes for OpenSUSE, FreeBSD, and MinGW-W64 environments through patch-based solutions ([#26005](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/26005))
- **MirageOS maintenance** with systematic x-maintenance-intent declarations and dependency cleanup across the unikernel ecosystem
summaries.contributors_summary: Kate managed repository maintenance, Hannes Mehnert fixed bin_prot issues, and Reynir Björnsson released awa 0.5.2
summaries.contributors:
- [Kate](https://github.com/kit-ty-kate) managed repository maintenance activities including dream-inertia variable fix ([#27955](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27955)) and OCaml 5.4 preview package coordination
- [Hannes Mehnert](https://github.com/hannesm) resolved bin_prot compilation issues with patch-based fixes for OpenSUSE and FreeBSD ([#26005](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/26005), [#27646](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27646)) and dns-cli dependency corrections
- [Reynir Björnsson](https://github.com/reynir) released awa 0.5.2 SSH implementation with MirageOS support ([#27942](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27942)) and reported cca compilation issues ([#27952](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27952))
- [Florian Angeletti](https://github.com/Octachron) coordinated OCaml 5.4 release readiness tracking with platform tools and ecosystem status monitoring ([#27916](https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/issues/27916))
- Multiple package maintainers contributed releases including containers 3.16, cohttp 6.1.1, YoCaML 2.3.0, LLVM 19, and numerous other ecosystem updates
